body_html: Since the technique is quite simple and not specific to the optimizer responsibilities, and is very simple to implement yourself, I think it's better to avoid adding this patch to the core. I'd encourage you to post issues before you start implementing features, so we can avoid situations like these. Thanks for the PR!

body: Since the technique is quite simple and not specific to the optimizer responsibilities, and is very simple to implement yourself, I think it's better to avoid adding this patch to the core. I'd encourage you to post issues before you start implementing features, so we can avoid situations like these. Thanks for the PR!
